entry.show: if (wtfile='') then $VALUE=0 else $VALUE=1 endif

radio.label: sine
radio.vq: lb sb gf awc
radio.vc: lb='n' gf='n' awc='n' sinebell wft(1)

radio.label: pseudo-echo
radio.vq: lb gf sb awc
radio.vc: lb='n' gf='n' sb='n' awc='n' pseudo wft(1)

radio.label: Resolution-Enhance
radio.vq: lb gf sb awc at np fn
radio.vc: sb='n' awc='n' lb=-.318/(0.1*at) gf=0.3*at fn=2*np wft(1)

radio.label: sq-cosine
radio.vq: lb gf sb sbs awc at
radio.vc: lb='n' gf='n' sb=-at sbs=sb awc='n' wft(1)

radio.label: sq-sine
radio.vq: lb gf sb awc
radio.vc: lb='n' gf='n' sb='n' awc='n' sqsinebell wft(1)

radio.label: cosine
radio.vq: lb gf sb sbs awc at
radio.vc: lb='n' gf='n' sb=at sbs=-at awc='n' wft(1)

radio.label: gaussian
radio.vq: gf at gfs lb sb awc
radio.vc: gf=at/2 lb='n' gfs='n' sb='n' awc='n' wft(1)

radio.label: exponential
radio.vq: lb sb gf awc at
radio.vc: lb=1/at sb='n' gf='n' awc='n' wft(1)

check.set: exists('ssfilter','parameter'):$v1 if $v1<0.5 then $VALUE=0 else on('ssfilter'):$VALUE endif

radio.vq: lpopt proc
radio.show: if proc='lp' then on('lpopt'):$VALUE else $VALUE=-1 endif

radio.label: back
radio.vq: lpopt proc
radio.show: if proc='lp' then on('lpopt'):$VALUE else $VALUE=-1 endif

button.label: Auto (x2)
button.vq: lpopt1 strtlp1 ni lpfilt1 lpnupts1 fn1 lpext1 fn1 strtext1 sb1 sw1 sbs1 lb1 gf1 awc1 proc1
button.vc: parlp(1) lpopt1='f' strtlp1=ni if ni<17 then lpfilt1=ni/2-1 else lpfilt1=8 endif lpnupts1=ni fn1=2*ni lpext1=fn1-ni strtext1=ni+1 sb1=2.0*ni/sw1 sbs1=-sb1 lb1='n' gf1='n' awc1='n' fn1=4*2.0*ni proc1='lp'

button.label: Auto
button.vq: lpopt1 strtlp1 ni lpfilt1 lpnupts1 fn1 lpext1 fn1 strtext1 sb1 sw1 sbs1 lb1 gf1 awc1 proc1
button.vc: parlp(1) lpopt1='f' strtlp1=r7 if r7=16 then lpfilt1=7 else lpfilt1=8 endif lpnupts1=r7 lpext1=r6-r7 strtext1=r7+1 sb1=-2*r6/(2*sw1) sbs1=sb1 fn1=2*r6 proc1='lp'

radio.label: gaussian
radio.vq: gf1 gfs1 ni sw1 sb1 awc1
radio.vc: gf1=ni/(2*sw1) gfs1='n' sb1='n' awc1='n'

radio.label: sine
radio.vq: lb1 sb1 sbs1 gf1 awc1 ni sw1
radio.vc: lb1='n' gf1='n' awc1='n' sb1=ni/(2.0*sw1) sbs1='n'

radio.label: sq-sine
radio.vq: lb1 gf1 sb1 sbs1 awc1 ni sw1
radio.vc: lb1='n' gf1='n' sb1=-ni/(2.0*sw1) awc1='n' sbs1='n'

radio.label: cosine
radio.vq: lb1 gf1 sb1 awc1 sbs1 ni sw1
radio.vc: lb1='n' gf1='n' sb1=ni/sw1 sbs1=-sb1 awc1='n'

radio.label: sq-cosine
radio.vq: lb1 gf1 sb1 awc1 ni sw1 sbs1
radio.vc: lb1='n' gf1='n' sb1=-ni/sw1 sbs1=sb1 awc1='n'

radio.label: pseudo-echo
radio.vq: lb1 gf1 sb1 awc1 ni sw1 gfs1

radio.label: exponential
radio.vq: lb1 sb1 gf1 awc1 ni sw1
radio.vc: lb1=ni/(2.0*sw1) sb1='n' gf1='n' awc1='n'
